dhp235:2: te → taṃ (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed, pts2ed)
dhp236:4: Dibbaṃ ariyabhūmiṃ upehisi → dibbaṃ ariyabhūmimehisi (bj, sya-all, pts1ed, pts2ed); dibbamariyabhūmiṃ upehisi (?)
dhp238:4: Na punaṃ jātijaraṃ → na puna jātijaraṃ (bj, sya-all); na puna jātijjaraṃ (mr)
dhp249:3: Tattha yo ca maṅku bhavati → tattha ce maṃku yo hoti (bj); tattha yo maṅkuto hoti (sya-all); tattha yo maṅku hoti (pts1ed); tattha yo maṅku bhavati (pts2ed)
